overview: In "Boys Get Spanked", Aiden teaches her husband a lesson replete with domination, humiliation, and the help of his side chick after the two discover each other. This education proves invaluable. "Earned It", follows with Adriana Chechik in the role of an obsessive fan hellbent on proving to a famous dom that she is the most extreme and most deserving of his attention. When he realizes that her letters won't stop until he's given her a chance, Manuel puts her through a series of tests before deciding whether she's worthy of his attention.
title: Sordid Stories 2
